name: pg-structure
description: Get PostgreSQL database structure as a detailed JS Object.

scripts.xdoc: jsdoc --package ./package.json -c jsdoc-conf.json README-JSDOC.md;    rm -f README.md;    jsdoc2md --src "lib/**/*" >JSDOC.md;    cat README-JSDOC.md JSDOC.md History.md LICENSE > README.md;    rm -r -f JSDOC.md;
scripts.xdoc:readme-jsdoc: rm -f docs/readme.md; cat docs/link-to-doc.md docs/index.md docs/concepts.md docs/history.md docs/license.md > docs/readme-jsdoc.md
scripts.doc:readme: jsdoc2md --src "lib/**/*" > JSDOC.md; cat docs/link-to-doc.md docs/index.md > README.md; rm -f JSDOC.md docs/link-to-doc.md;
scripts.doc: npm run doc:mkdocs && npm run doc:report && npm run doc:readme
scripts.preversion: npm run doc && eslint lib &&  npm test
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && rm -rf build/temp && git subtree push --prefix site origin gh-pages
